At TruValue Labs™, we harness the power of artificial intelligence to help the investment industry understand how sustainable companies are. Investors are increasingly demanding that their dollars be invested in companies that make the world better – and whose prospects are stronger because they take positive action on environmental, social, and governance, or ESG, issues. Our technology provides the only ESG data solution that includes timely data, information that’s not reported by companies themselves, and covers both negative and positive events.
